# Proofs

Provide proofs of each of the following arguments. You should enter these in http://carnap.io, and make a note in Canvas when you are done.

1. $(A \vee B) \wedge (A \vee C) \vdash A \vee (B \wedge C)$
2. $B \vdash \neg (A \wedge \neg A)$
3. $(A \rightarrow C) \wedge (B \rightarrow C) \vdash (A \vee B) \rightarrow C$
4. $\neg A \rightarrow \neg B \vdash B \rightarrow A$
5. $A \rightarrow (B \vee C) \vdash (A \rightarrow B) \vee (A \rightarrow C)$
